hanzi-su-wiki:
滴

Значения

Капать; капля

Мнемоника

Справа — император 帝 и рот 口 в значении «запрет», т.к. монарх не любит лишней болтовни. При засухе на воду 氵 налагается запрет, она выдается по каплям.
purpleculture_pinyin:
dī
a drop; to drip
капля; капать
rtega_mnemonic:
滴滴RSdrip, drop of water
  • water 氵 falling in series like standing stalks on the field 啇
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 啇 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
点滴 [ diǎn dī ]: a drip; a little bit; intravenous drip (used to administer drugs)
滴水 [ dī shuǐ ]: water drop; dripping water
一点一滴 [ yī diǎn yī dī ]: bit by bit; every little bit
滴灌 [ dī guàn ]: drip irrigation; to irrigate by drip feed
娇滴滴 [ jiāo dī dī ]: sweet; cute; delicately pretty

heisig_chinese_memo: DRIPS of WATER were collected in ANTIQUE VASES since the museum had a leaky roof.
heisig_constituent: drip, water, water droplets, water pistol, antique, vase, stand up, hood, old, tombstone, gravestone, church, ten, needle, mouth
heisig_story: Picture water dripping on what you thought were precious antiques, only to find that the artificial aging painted on them is running!
koohiiStory1: DRIPS of WATER were collected in ANTIQUE VASES since the museum had a leaky roof.
koohiiStory2: You must never let water drip onto antiques.
jp_example_words: 水滴(すいてき): drop of water
jp_readingExamples: 滴 (しずく), 滴る (したた.る)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tsunami hits your mohawk and it begins to drip. The water from the tsunami continues to drip from your mohawk long after the tsunami has passed. There’s a lot of water in your hair now, so it’s probably going to drip for a while.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine having all this tsunami water in your hair. Hear it drip from your mohawk. Drip… drip… drip…
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Luckily, you’re a self-proclaimed techie (てき), so you develop a device to stop the drip drip dripping. This techie device of yours is like a hair dryer helmet. You put it over your mohawk, it does its thing, and your hair is dry! Being a techie sure does have its benefits.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Feel the weight of this dryer helmet on your head as you listen to it whirr away. The dripping has finally stopped! Success!
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 并, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 十 (десять), 口 (рот), 汁 (суп), 立 (стоять), 滴 (капля)

dī: (глаг) капать; лить по капле
dī: (графема) капля, капелька
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the old trader's (啇) water (氵) is dripping
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: DRIPS of WATER were collected in ANTIQUE VASES since the museum had a leaky roof.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and "啻", the original meaning is that the liquid drops little by little. "Shuowen": "Water is also injected. From the water, the sound is squeaky." One of Jin Panyue's "Poems for the Dead": "The spring breeze comes to the edge, and the morning slips and drops.

" Drops " also mean liquids that fall in small amounts. Tang Jiadao "Gan Qiu": "The clouds hide the strange peaks, and the rain sprinkles and drips."

" Drip " is also used as a quantifier, mostly used for liquids that drip in granular form. Tang Wei Yingwu "Song of Dew": "A drop of dew on the autumn lotus will sink into the sky in the clear night."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and "啻", the original meaning is liquid falling little by little.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「啻」聲，本義為液體一點一點地下落。《說文》：「水注也。从水，啻聲。」晉潘岳〈悼亡詩〉之一：「春風緣隙來，晨霤承檐滴。」

　　「滴」也表示點點下落的液體。唐賈島〈感秋〉：「朝雲藏奇峰，暮雨灑疏滴。」

　　「滴」也用作量詞，多用於呈顆粒狀滴下的液體。唐韋應物〈詠露珠〉：「秋荷一滴露，清夜墜玄天。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「啻」聲，本義為液體一點一點地下落。

水滴(すいてき): drop of water
從「 水 」，「 啻 」聲，本義為液體一點一點地下落。《說文》：「水注也。从水，啻聲。」晉潘岳〈悼亡詩〉之一：「春風緣隙來，晨霤承檐滴。」 「 滴 」也表示點點下落的液體。唐賈島〈感秋〉：「朝雲藏奇峰，暮雨灑疏滴。」 「 滴 」也用作量詞，多用於呈顆粒狀滴下的液體。唐韋應物〈詠露珠〉：「秋荷一滴露，清夜墜玄天。」
From the sound of " water" and " 啻", the original meaning is that the liquid drops little by little. "Shuowen": "Water is also injected. From the water, the sound is squeaky." One of Jin Panyue's "Poems for the Dead": "The spring breeze comes to the edge, and the morning slips and drops. " Drops" also mean liquids that fall in small amounts. Tang Jiadao "Gan Qiu": "The clouds hide the strange peaks, and the rain sprinkles and drips." " Drip" is also used as a quantifier, mostly used for liquids that drip in granular form. Tang Wei Yingwu "Song of Dew": "A drop of dew on the autumn lotus will sink into the sky in the clear night."

滴字的基本解释

滴
dī
液体一点一点地向下落：滴眼药。滴落。滴翠。水滴石穿（喻只要有恒心，不断努力，事情一定能成功，亦作“滴水穿石”）。滴漏（漏壶）。
一点一点向下落的液体：水滴。汗滴。
量词，用于滴下的液体的数量：滴水不漏。两滴墨水。

滴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dī］
［《廣韻》都歷切，入鍚，端。］
亦作“渧2”。
(1)液体一点一点地下落。
(2)泛指物体掉落。
(3)点点下落的液体。
(4)量词。多用于呈颗粒状滴下的液体。
(5)象声词。

滴字的英文翻译

◎ 滴
dripping, dript, drop, globelet, gutta, instillation, trickle

滴字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滴； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页644第03
【廣韻】都歷切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】丁歷切，?音的。【說文】水註也。【增韻】涓滴，水點。又瀝下也。【王子年·拾遺記】香露滴瀝。　【廣韻】亦作?。【法華經】作渧，與滳異。

滴字的源字形

滴字的起名意思

指液体一点一点落下来。

drop
Basic explanation of words
drop
dī
The liquid drops little by little: eye drops. Dripping. Di Cui. Water dripping through the stone (Yu, as long as there is perseverance and continuous hard work, things will be successful, also known as "drip water through the stone"). Hourglass (clepskin).
Liquid falling bit by bit: water droplets. Sweat drops.
Quantifier, used for the amount of dripping liquid: dripping water does not leak. Two drops of ink.
drop
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dī］
["Guangyun" is always cut, enters and ends. ]
Also known as "渧2".
(1) The liquid drops little by little.
(2) Generally refers to the falling of an object.
(3) Dropping liquid.
(4) Quantifiers. It is mostly used for liquids that drip in granular form.
(5) Onomatopoeia.
drop

dripping, dript, drop, globelet, gutta, instillation, trickle
drop

形声字。水())表意,其形像水流或水滴,表示水一点一点地落下;商(di)表声,商是植物的根,表示液体落下像树根
一样钻入土中。本义是水一点一点地落下。

体:雨~「汗~。③量词:一~血「两~墨水。

滴|滴
プ
楷
enuar
уронить
Пиктофонетические символы.
Вода ()) означает, что его форма похожа на ручей или каплю воды, что означает, что вода падает понемногу; коэффициент (ди) означает, что корень растения является корнем растения, что означает, что жидкость падает в почву, как корень дерева.
Первоначальный смысл в том, что вода капает понемногу.
① Жидкость постепенно капает: вода ~ износ камней.
Жидкость падает по крупицам: дождь ~ "пот ~. ③ количественный показатель: один ~ кровь" два ~ чернила. ~ Червь ~ ответ ~ трубка ~ наполнение ~ течь ~ бутылка ~ вода ~ вода не течет ~ вода становится точкой замерзания ~ рассеивается ~ вода ~ Пусть ваши желания растут ~
слива.
Drop | drop
Кай
dī
1) капать, сочиться, точиться, стекать; капающий; капельный
房檐上的水不断地滴下来 вода непрерывно капает с крыш
滴汞电极 капельный ртутный электрод
2) переливаться, отливать (о цвете)
珠缨冷光滴 ленты жемчужные блеском холодным играли
3) накапливать, лить по капле, источать
滴眼药 закапать глазные капли
4) разводить, разбавлять каплями
滴粉 разводить белила (пудру)
5) капля, капелька, также счетное слово
水滴 капли воды
一滴血 одна капля крови
两滴眼泪 две слезинки
6) de инт. вм. 的
Radicals: 氵, 啇  (tsunami, mohawk)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tsunami hits your mohawk and it begins to drip. The water from the tsunami continues to drip from your mohawk long after the tsunami has passed. There’s a lot of water in your hair now, so it’s probably going to drip for a while.
Imagine having all this tsunami water in your hair. Hear it drip from your mohawk. Drip… drip… drip…
Reading Mnemonic
Luckily, you’re a self-proclaimed techie (てき), so you develop a device to stop the drip drip dripping. This techie device of yours is like a hair dryer helmet. You put it over your mohawk, it does its thing, and your hair is dry! Being a techie sure does have its benefits.
Feel the weight of this dryer helmet on your head as you listen to it whirr away. The dripping has finally stopped! Success!
